title.narrative: Winterization Assistance to the most vulnerable affected and displaced populations in Afghanistan

description.narrative: Through this project, IOM provide winterization support to displaced and other vulnerable families through distribution of cash for winterization, provision of complementary NFI assistance and distribution of cash for shelter repairs/upgrades. A total of 61,880 individuals (average of 7 persons per family ) are directly targeted for assistance. Implementation is undertaken in coordination with relevant and operational partners in the targeted provinces including coordination with de facto authorities at Afghanistan National Disaster Management Authority (ANDMA) HQ and provinces as well as Ministry of Refugee and Repatriation (MoRR) and Directorate of Refugees and Repatriation (DoRRs).
